venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SATURDAY meetup at Peter's Park!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Your frenchie's canine brothers, sisters and friends are more than welcome to join us at the park! Please abide by the weight/size limits posted at the entrance to the small and larger dog entrances.

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Small enclosure for dogs 25lbs and under.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June French Bulldog Meetup
